section: You climb down the ladder into a house with herbs and plants hanging on the walls, and shelves lined with pots, pans and bottles of all sorts. The healer, an old woman, can cure you of poison but is unable to cure disease, lift curses or heal wounds. It will cost you 25 Shards to get cured, if you are poisoned. If you pay, you can restore all of your affected abilities to normal. When you are ready, turn back to 427.
